description: This table contains the treatment days in a treatment plan record or the steps in a pathway record.

columns.name: TREATMENT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The treatment plan ID.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number that corresponds to each treatment day in the treatment plan in this row.

columns.name: TREATMENT_DAY_ID
columns.description: The treatment day row ID of a treatment day in the treatment plan.

columns.name: TX_DAY_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The treatment day type (outpatient or inpatient) of a treatment day in the treatment plan.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Inpatient


Outpatient

columns.name: TREATMENT_DAY_DAT
columns.description: The contact date (DAT) of a treatment day record in the treatment plan.

columns.name: TREATMENT_DAY_NAME
columns.description: The treatment day name of a treatment day in the treatment plan.

columns.name: TRT_CYCLE
columns.description: The cycle containing a treatment day in the treatment plan.

columns.name: TREATMENT_DATE
columns.description: The planned date in external format when a treatment day in the treatment plan is expected to occur.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The contact serial number (CSN) of the first patient encounter in which an order from this treatment day was released.

columns.name: TRT_DAY_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status of a treatment day in the treatment plan. For example, Planned, Scheduled, Deferred, Canceled, Completed, or Deleted.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Planned


Scheduled


Completed


Deleted


Started


Deferred


Canceled


Given Externally


Unscheduled


Non-Treatment Orders

columns.name: TRT_DAY_WAIT_AFTER
columns.description: The number of days to wait after a treatment day in the treatment plan.

columns.name: TRT_DAY_MAX_LEAD
columns.description: The max lead of a treatment day in the treatment plan.

columns.name: TRT_DAY_MAX_LAG
columns.description: The max lag of a treatment day in the treatment plan.

columns.name: TRT_DAY_UNIQ_ID
columns.description: A cycle-level unique ID of a treatment day in the treatment plan.

columns.name: TRT_DAY_NUM
columns.description: The treatment day number for this treatment day.

columns.name: STEP_START_DTTM
columns.description: The start date and time of the step.

columns.name: MANUAL_STRT_STP_YN
columns.description:
This flag indicates whether the step should be manually started. Y indicates that the step should be started manually. A null value or N indicates that the step doesn't need to be started manually.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: MANUAL_STRT_USER_ID
columns.description: The user who manually started the step.

columns.name: MANUAL_STRT_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when the step was manually started.

columns.name: STEP_DURATION_SECS
columns.description: This item stores the duration of the step in seconds. This value can be added to the start date and time to get the end date and time of the step.

columns.name: TX_STAT_CHG_USER_ID
columns.description: This item stores the ID of the user who changed the status of this treatment day.

columns.name: DAY_LENGTH
columns.description: The number of calendar days that are represented by the treatment day.

columns.name: TX_STATUS_CHG_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant at which the day status changed.

columns.name: DAY_CREATED_BY_ID
columns.description: Stores the ID of the user who created the treatment day.

columns.name: DAY_CREATE_DTTM
columns.description: Instant when the treatment day was created.

columns.name: DAY_CREATE_COMMENT
columns.description: Additional comment entered by user when creating the treatment day.

columns.name: DAY_SOURCE_UID
columns.description: Stores the unique ID of the day from which it was created.

columns.name: TX_PLANNED_DT
columns.description: Stores the planned date for the treatment day.

columns.name: TX_STARTED_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant at which the day was started.

columns.name: DAY_SOURCE_CSN
columns.description: When the treatment plan day is created from a protocol (PRL), the source treatment day (OSQ)'s contact serial number will be set in this item.  If the treatment plan day is copied or deferred, this item will be copied into the new day.

columns.name: AUTO_COMP_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status of the "Status" item of the day. Used in the cases where the system changes the status of the day (mainly auto-completes a day) so that we can determine if we need to let the user know about it the next time they open the plan.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Pending


Reverted


Final

columns.name: TREAT_DAY_CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: The contact date real of the treatment day (TRG) record which is held in this row.  The contact date real is a unique, internal contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of the contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: DEFERRED_FROM_LN
columns.description: If this treatment day was created by deferring another treatment day, this item will contain the line number of that deferred treatment day.

columns.name: CONVERSION_TARGET
columns.description: If this day was replaced for conversion, this will be the day (given by line in SI TPl 5000) that replaced it.

columns.name: DAY_SOURCE_INSTANCE_NUM
columns.description: For the clinical protocol treatment day contact indicated by the contact serial number in the DAY_SOURCE_CSN column, this column stores the instance number (or repetition number) represented by this day in the treatment plan.

columns.name: TX_SCHED_DATE
columns.description: Stores the date for which the treatment day is scheduled.

columns.name: TX_SCHED_CONFLICT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores whether the scheduled date of the treatment day is outside tolerance range or if multiple appointments are scheduled for the same treatment day.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Outside Tolerance


Multiple Orders
